$header

$header : array

Imported $_SERVER['HTTP_*'] values.

Header keys are normalized and lower-cased; keys and values are filtered for control characters.

Type

array

Tags

todo

$input

$input : string

The value of `php://input`.

Type

string

Tags

todo

$agents

$agents : array

An array of http user-agents used in matching mobile browsers and crawlers

Type

array

See also

Tags

todo

$is_mobile

$is_mobile : mixed

A property to hold previous calls to isMobile() so you don't have to loop through $this->agents['mobile'] again.

Type

mixed

Tags

todo

$is_crawler

$is_crawler : mixed

A property to hold previous calls to isCrawler() so you don't have to loop through $this->agents['crawler'] again.

Type

mixed

Tags

todo

Methods

__construct()

__construct(array $globals, array $agents)

Constructor.

Parameters

array $globals

An array of global variables, typically $GLOBALS.
array $agents

An array of override agent values.

isMobile()

isMobile() : mixed

Is this a mobile device?

Returns

mixed —

False if not mobile, or the matched pattern if it is.

isCrawler()

isCrawler() : mixed

Returns

mixed —

getQuery()

getQuery(string $key, string $alt) : mixed

Retrieves an **unfiltered** value by key from the `$get` property, or an alternate default value if that key does not exist.

Parameters

string $key

The $get key to retrieve the value of.
string $alt

The value to return if the key does not exist.

Returns

mixed —

The value of $get[$key], or the alternate default value.

Tags

todo

string $alt

Returns

getJsonInput()

getJsonInput(bool $assoc, int $depth) : object

Retrieves the `$input` property after applying `json_decode()`.

Parameters

bool $assoc

When true, returned objects will be converted into associative arrays.
int $depth

Recursion depth.

Returns

object —

The json_decode() results.

Tags

todo

Parameters

The $http key to retrieve the value of.
string $alt

The value to return if the key does not exist.

httpMethodOverride()

httpMethodOverride() : void

Overrides the REQUEST_METHOD with X-HTTP-Method-Override header or $_POST value.

Tags

todo

rebuildFiles()

rebuildFiles(array $src, array $tgt) : void

Recursive method to rebuild $_FILES structure to be more like $_POST.

Parameters

array $src

The source $_FILES array, perhaps from a sub- element of that array/
array $tgt

Where we will store the restructured data when we find it.

Tags

todo

getValue()

getValue(string $var, string $key, string $alt) : mixed

Common method to get a property value and return it.

Parameters

string $var

The property variable to fetch from: get, post, etc.
string $key

The array key, if any, to get the value of.
string $alt

The alternative default value to return if the requested key does not exist.

Returns

mixed —

The requested value, or the alternative default value.

todo
